name: MIDOLAM 1 MG/ML
treatmentDescriptions: midazolam is a short-acting sleep-inducing drug that is indicated:In adults• CONSCIOUS SEDATION before and during diagnostic or therapeutic procedures with or without local anaesthesia• ANAESTHESIA- Premedication before induction of anaesthesia- Induction of anaesthesia- As a sedative component in combined anaesthesia• SEDATION IN INTENSIVE CARE UNITSIn children• CONSCIOUS SEDATION before and during diagnostic or therapeutic procedures with or without local anaesthesia• ANAESTHESIA- Premedication before induction of anaesthesia• SEDATION IN INTENSIVE CARE UNITS
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לשימוש בבתי חולים או אשפוז יום
